TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Kdusan, title = Kdusan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kdusan} }

S.FORM: == Kdusan == u sulit nu Hulam: 格督尚部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Kdusan. u kasalumaluma' nu Kdusan sa, 364 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 1,201 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 1,069 ku tademaw, pakalatu 89%. u zuma sa, cay ku yuangcumin, 132 ku tademaw, pakalatu 11%. u asip nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Taluku(Truku) 70%, Pangcha(Amis) 9%, Tayan(Tayal) 3%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 1%, Sejek(Seediq) 0.5%, zumazuma 4%. u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis) u niyazu' nu Taluku(Truku) kuyni, katuud ku Taluku(Truku) itini mueneng. u zuma a tademaw sa u Yuwatan(Bunun), u Tayan atu Sejek. inayi' tu ku zuma cidekay a tademaw itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u siwkay nu Yuancumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin tademaw nu Yuancumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bulad tademaw nu Yuancumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2019 a mihcan 1 a bulad pulung sausi (566,129), Pangcah (211,279), Tayan (91,021), Paywan (101,560), Yuwatan (58,994), Rukay (13,390), Puyuma (14,358), Cou (6,668), Saysiat (6,676), Yami (4,635), Saw (803), Kabalan (1,482), Taluku (31,859), Sakizaya (961), Sejek (10,202), Laaluwa (405), Kanakanabu (345), zuma (11,541)

== Kdosan == o solit no Holam: 格督尚部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Kdosan. o kasalomaloma' no Kdosan sa, 364 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 1,201 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 1,069 ko tademaw, pakalato 89%. o zoma sa, cay ko yoangcomin, 132 ko tademaw, pakalato 11%. o asip no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Taloko(Troko) 70%, Pangcha(Amis) 9%, Tayan(Tayal) 3%, Yowatan(Bonon) 1%, Sejek(Seediq) 0.5%, zomazoma 4%. o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis) o niyazo' no Taloko(Troko) koyni, katood ko Taloko(Troko) itini moeneng. o zoma a tademaw sa o Yowatan(Bonon), o Tayan ato Sejek. inayi' to ko zoma cidekay a tademaw itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o siwkay no Yoancomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin tademaw no Yoancomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bolad tademaw no Yoancomin, polong saosi katokoh 2019 a mihcan 1 a bolad polong saosi (566,129), Pangcah (211,279), Tayan (91,021), Paywan (101,560), Yowatan (58,994), Rokay (13,390), Poyoma (14,358), Coo (6,668), Saysiat (6,676), Yami (4,635), Saw (803), Kabalan (1,482), Taloko (31,859), Sakizaya (961), Sejek (10,202), Laalowa (405), Kanakanabo (345), zoma (11,541)
